task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client Bug Fix:Removing already empty profile picture
description:
Summary:

Removing a profile picture which does not exist.

Steps to reproduce:

1)Run the app
2)Select a client from client activity
3)Click on profile picture

Expected behavior:

The option to remove profile picture should be present only when profile picture exists.

Observed behavior:

The option to remove profile picture even with no profile picture.

Device and Android version:

Android 5.0.2,API 21
